attributes.review: Wow this app is so bad, I love our president and i wanted to support him for the next election by downloading this app #trump2020 but then once i downloaded it, it signed me up for Biden’s texts! How awful is that??? How can they just assume that i would want biden?? anyways the app also crashed a whole lot and made me crash into a car! awful app don’t get it to support our lord and savior DJT!
attributes.title: sad app, awful app

attributes.review: I know that when I say that this app is awful, I can speak for myself, my family and my entire neighborhood. This app took FOREVER to download and it took up so much storage on my phone it glitched several times and I had to restart my phone on multiple occasions; the content wasn’t worth it AT ALL. Download this app at your own risk... ☠️☠️💀
attributes.title: Worst app I’ve ever downloaded

attributes.review: To start off, the app name is absolutely ridiculous, i downloaded it and it didnt load or open for 16 hours, it lagged my phone, and caused the wifi in my entire neighborhood to shut down, not only did it cause my phone to give off horrifying screeching noises and scare my dogs, it also stole ALL MY PHOTOS AND DATA AND HACKED MY CREDIT CARD. HORRIBLE APP, I WILL BE SUEING, DO NOT GET, I REPEAT, IF YOU LIKE THIS APP you're a ✨white supremacists ✨
attributes.title: Horrible 😭🧕🏻🧕🏻🧕🏻🧕🏻

attributes.review: This app is ✨HoRrIbLe✨once I opened it my eyes were filled with a big picture of a ✨orange Cheeto✨ lord help me👁👄👁 then my phone CrAsHeD and I looked at my wallpaper and it was 🤦🏻‍♀️😾 AdDiSoN rAe blackfishing and I turned off my phone and I looked👁👀👁 at my lock screen it was ✨Lil HuDdY✨ saying the N-word and the app filled me and my robot daughters head with facts of the ✨Cheeto✨ so I recommend not downloading this ✨✨HoRrEnDoUs✨✨ App// Trump 2020 but in a ✨Grave✨✨🥰🧚🏼
attributes.title: Just no❤️

attributes.review: If I could give this app a one star I would. My father continues to neglect and be little my presents in our everyday life. All I want to do is play roblox but noooo i can’t have a social life because daddy’s ego will be bruised. He thinks that I’m going to be some narcissistic fascist rapist like him. Like sorry daddy we all don’t dream of touching little kids as well as our own kids.✨🍃may this man burn in hell💅🤠.
attributes.title: Barron trump 🥺

attributes.review: I had initially downloaded this app to learn more about Trump, because I heard he was President of this country called the United States! But it kept crashing and called me a bunch of slurs! My mom opened it by accident and cried herself to sleep! What is this? Why is this app being racist? Why am I being called a slur? Is it because I’m black? How dare you!? This is so disrespectful! I wish I could give it ZERO stars! 😾😾😾🤬🤬🤬
attributes.title: Terrible App!

attributes.review: This app sent a chimpanzee to my house and I did not enjoy it🦧 the app started making my phone glitch out and crash If I where you I would delete this app right away. Also right as I downloaded the app it changed my background to Danny Devito, honestly not complaining about that tho. But still this app messed with my life so much. Also the owner got right of TIK TOK 🧚🏻‍♂️🥺💕BRING BACK TIK TOK💕🥺🧚🏻‍♂️
attributes.title: 🤮DISGUSTING🤮

attributes.review:
I tried to download this app to support my president but when I downloaded it, suddenly my phone turned off and turned into a brick and I took it to Apple and they told me that it had coronavirus so there’s nothing they could do. 
THIS APP SPREADS CORONAVIRUS AND CAN RUIN YOUR PHONE IM SO SAD IM TYPING THIS ON MY IPAD. 
I wish that this app wasn’t on the App Store because now I’m scared I got it. I wasn’t wearing a mask when I was on my phone what if it spread to me????
attributes.title: FAKE NEWS

attributes.review: Hi! I’m Karen.🥰 so I downloaded this app today and when I opened it...it didn’t include the free to play games I asked for😡🥰 (Cheeto Run, Orange Land, Trump Dump etc). I will be contacting corporate for false advertisement. 😳🤯🙄🥰 I hope you learn from your mistakes. My son Kyle had to go to the hospital because of how toxic the contents of this app were. 🤕🤒🥰 Alrighty then. God 🙏✝️✨ bless you and have a fruitful day....getting fired. 🥰🧚🏻‍♀️✨
attributes.title: I’d like to speak to the manager. 🙄😑

attributes.review: Truly a poor app. I do not recommend getting it. It crashed and honestly is just terrible quality and it’s unbelievable that this app is still up while he’s trying to take down tiktok (in the us) that is great quality. Unbelievable. I feel bad for the kid’s that use it to express themselfs. And I truly do not recommend this app at all.
attributes.title: Poor quality.
